verses.t: There was{G2258} a man{G444} of{G1537} the Pharisees{G3588}, named{G3686} Nicodemus{G3530}, a ruler{G758} of the Jews{G2453}:

Nicodemus{G3588} saith{G3004} unto{G4314} him{G846}, How{G4459} can{G1410} a man{G444} be born{G1080} when he is{G5607} old{G1088}? can he{G1410} enter{G1525} the second time{G1208} into{G1519} his{G846} mother's{G3588} womb{G3588}, and{G2532} be born{G1080}?

That which is born{G1080} of{G1537} the flesh{G3588} is{G2076} flesh{G4561}; and{G2532} that which is born{G1080} of{G1537} the Spirit{G3588} is{G2076} spirit{G4151}.
Marvel{G2296} not{G3361} that{G3754} I said{G2036} unto thee{G4671}, Ye{G5209} must{G1163} be born{G1080} again{G509}.

The wind{G3588} bloweth{G4154} where{G3699} it listeth{G2309}, and{G2532} thou hearest{G191} the sound{G3588} thereof{G846}, but{G235} canst{G1492} not{G3756} tell{G1492} whence{G4159} it cometh{G2064}, and{G2532} whither{G4226} it goeth{G5217}: so{G3779} is{G2076} every{G3956} one that is born{G1080} of{G1537} the Spirit{G3588}.
Nicodemus{G3530} answered{G611} and{G2532} said{G2036} unto him{G846}, How{G4459} can{G1410} these things{G5023} be{G1096}?
Jesus{G3588} answered{G611} and{G2532} said{G2036} unto him{G846}, Art{G1488} thou{G4771} a master{G3588} of Israel{G2474}, and{G2532} knowest{G1097} not{G3756} these things{G5023}?

Verily{G281}, verily{G281}, I say{G3004} unto thee{G4671}, We speak{G2980} that{G3739} we do know{G1492}, and{G2532} testify{G3140} that{G3739} we have seen{G3708}; and{G2532} ye receive{G2983} not{G3756} our{G2257} witness{G3588}.

If{G1487} I have told{G2036} you{G5213} earthly things{G1919}, and{G2532} ye believe{G4100} not{G3756}, how{G4459} shall ye believe{G4100}, if{G1437} I tell{G2036} you{G5213} of heavenly things{G2032}?

And{G2532} no man{G3762} hath ascended up{G305} to{G1519} heaven{G3588}, but{G3361} he that{G3588} came down{G2597} from{G1537} heaven{G3588}, even the Son{G3588} of man{G3588} which is{G5607} in{G1722} heaven{G3588}.
And{G2532} as{G2531} Moses{G3475} lifted up{G5312} the serpent{G3588} in{G1722} the wilderness{G2048}, even so{G3779} must{G1163} the Son{G3588} of man{G3588} be lifted up{G5312}:
That{G2443} whosoever{G3956} believeth{G4100} in{G1519} him{G846} should{G622} not{G3361} perish{G622}, but{G235} have{G2192} eternal{G166} life{G2222}.

For{G1063} God{G3588} so{G3779} loved{G25} the world{G3588}, that{G5620} he gave{G1325} his{G846} only begotten{G3439} Son{G3588}, that{G2443} whosoever{G3956} believeth{G4100} in{G1519} him{G846} should{G622} not{G3361} perish{G622}, but{G235} have{G2192} everlasting{G166} life{G2222}.

For{G1063} God{G3588} sent{G649} not{G3756} his{G846} Son{G3588} into{G1519} the world{G3588} to{G2443} condemn{G2919} the world{G3588}; but{G235} that{G2443} the world{G3588} through{G1223} him{G846} might be saved{G4982}.

He that believeth{G4100} on{G1519} him{G846} is{G2919} not{G3756} condemned{G2919}: but{G1161} he that believeth{G4100} not{G3361} is condemned{G2919} already{G2235}, because{G3754} he hath{G4100} not{G3361} believed{G4100} in{G1519} the name{G3588} of the only begotten{G3439} Son{G5207} of God{G3588}.

And{G1161} this{G3778} is{G2076} the condemnation{G3588}, that{G3754} light{G3588} is come{G2064} into{G1519} the world{G3588}, and{G2532} men{G3588} loved{G25} darkness{G3588} rather{G3123} than{G2228} light{G3588}, because{G1063} their{G846} deeds{G3588} were{G2258} evil{G4190}.

For{G1063} every{G3956} one that doeth{G4238} evil{G5337} hateth{G3404} the light{G3588}, neither{G3756} cometh{G2064} to{G4314} the light{G3588}, lest{G3361} his{G846} deeds{G3588} should be reproved{G1651}.hina mee (lest) - hina empty

But{G1161} he that doeth{G4160} truth{G3588} cometh{G2064} to{G4314} the light{G3588}, that{G2443} his{G846} deeds{G3588} may be made manifest{G5319}, that{G3754} they are{G2076} wrought{G2038} in{G1722} God{G2316}.

After{G3326} these things{G5023} came{G2064} Jesus{G3588} and{G2532} his{G846} disciples{G3588} into{G1519} the land{G1093} of Judæa{G2453}; and{G2532} there{G1563} he tarried{G1304} with{G3326} them{G846}, and{G2532} baptized{G907}.

And{G1161} John{G2491} also{G2532} was{G2258} baptizing{G907} in{G1722} Ænon{G137} near{G1451} to Salim{G4530}, because{G3754} there was{G2258} much{G4183} water{G5204} there{G1563}: and{G2532} they came{G3854}, and{G2532} were baptized{G907}.
For{G1063} John{G3588} was{G2258} not yet{G3768} cast{G906} into{G1519} prison{G3588}.
Then{G3767} there arose{G1096} a question{G2214} between{G3326} some of{G1537} John's{G2491} disciples{G3588} and{G3326} the Jews{G2453} about{G4012} purifying{G2512}.

And{G2532} they came{G2064} unto{G4314} John{G3588}, and{G2532} said{G2036} unto him{G846}, Rabbi{G4461}, he{G3739} that was{G2258} with{G3326} thee{G4675} beyond{G4008} Jordan{G3588}, to whom{G3739} thou{G4771} barest witness{G3140}, behold{G1492}, the same{G3778} baptizeth{G907}, and{G2532} all{G3956} men come{G2064} to{G4314} him{G846}.
John{G2491} answered{G611} and{G2532} said{G2036}, A man{G444} can{G1410} receive{G2983} nothing{G3762}, except{G3361} it be{G5600}given{G1325} him{G846} from{G1537} heaven{G3588}.

Ye{G5210} yourselves{G846} bear{G3140} me{G3427} witness{G3140}, that{G3754} I said{G2036}, I{G1473} am{G1510} not{G3756} the Christ{G3588}, but{G235} that{G3754} I am{G1510} sent{G649} before{G1715} him{G1565}.

He that hath{G2192} the bride{G3588} is{G2076} the bridegroom{G3566}: but{G1161} the friend{G5384} of the bridegroom{G3588}, which standeth{G2476} and{G2532} heareth{G191} him{G846}, rejoiceth{G5463} greatly{G5479} because{G1223} of the{G3588} bridegroom's{G3588} voice{G5456}: this{G3778} my{G1699} joy{G3588} therefore{G3767} is fulfilled{G4137}.
He{G1565} must{G1163} increase{G837}, but{G1161} I{G1691} must decrease{G1642}.

He that cometh{G2064} from above{G509} is{G2076} above{G1883} all{G3956}: he that is{G5607} of{G1537} the earth{G3588} is{G2076} earthly{G3588}, and{G2532} speaketh{G2980} of{G1537} the earth{G3588}: he that cometh{G2064} from{G1537} heaven{G3588} is{G2076} above{G1883} all{G3956}.
And{G2532} what{G3739} he hath seen{G3708} and{G2532} heard{G191}, that{G5124} he testifieth{G3140}; and{G2532} no man{G3762} receiveth{G2983} his{G846} testimony{G3588}.
He that hath received{G2983} his{G846} testimony{G3588} hath set to his seal{G4972} that{G3754} God{G3588} is{G2076} true{G227}.

For{G1063} he whom{G3739} God{G3588} hath sent{G649} speaketh{G2980} the words{G3588} of God{G3588}: for{G1063} God{G3588} giveth{G1325} not{G3756} the Spirit{G3588} by{G1537} measure{G3358} unto him.
The Father{G3588} loveth{G25} the Son{G3588}, and{G2532} hath given{G1325} all things{G3956} into{G1722} his{G846} hand{G3588}.

He that believeth{G4100} on{G1519} the Son{G3588} hath{G2192} everlasting{G166} life{G2222}: and{G1161} he that believeth not{G544} the Son{G3588} shall{G3700} not{G3756} see{G3700} life{G2222}; but{G235} the wrath{G3588} of God{G3588} abideth{G3306} on{G1909} him{G846}.
